summary: This tiny mod edits the helmet.nif file from the Iron armor and lets you wear the Dovahkhiin helmet without it ruining your hair.
descriptionHtml: This is a simple mod that adds (not replaces) the "Barbarian Crown" aka an edited mesh of the iron helmet. It uses a circlet slot so you can still look badass while showing off your gorgeous locks.Â
author: TelmeriaScion
